title: Windows Insiders can now try dynamic refresh rate on the Surface Laptop Studio
content:
Microsoft has finally begun testing the dynamic refresh rate feature on the Surface Laptop Studio, roughly six months after the laptop was launched. This enables the display on the laptop to automatically switch between a 60Hz or 120Hz refresh rate as needed, something Microsoft has promised since it first launched the laptop. The feature is

The post Windows Insiders can now try dynamic refresh rate on the Surface Laptop Studio appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is rolling out a set of updates to Windows Insiders that enable the dynamic refresh rate mode on the Surface Laptop Studio.
